sense.gloss: falling lightly (e.g. snow, petals, confetti), fluttering
(hear, see) from time to time, intermittently

sdata.j: ↑遠↑↓とお↓くで↑小↑↓ちい↓さな↑明↑↓あ↓かりが|ちらちら|していた。
sdata.e: Little lights were blinking on and off in the distance.

sdata.j: ちょっと↑屈↑↓かが↓めば、アソコが|チラチラ|と↑見↑↓み↓え↑隠↑↓かく↓れします。
sdata.e: If you just crouch a little, her crotch can just be seen flicking in and out of sight.

sdata.j: あの↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓、さっきからこっちを|チラチラ|↑見↑↓み↓てるけど、あなたの↑知↑↓し↓ってる↑人↑↓ひと↓？
sdata.e: That man over there has been glancing at us furtively for a while, do you know him?

sdata.j: ちょっと↑屈↑↓かが↓めば、↑信号↑↓しんごう↓↑旗↑↓き↓が|チラチラ|と↑見↑↓み↓え↑隠↑↓かく↓れします。
sdata.e: If you just crouch a little, the signal flag can just be seen flicking in and out of sight.
